ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Song Icon Bug
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, in the case of invis, can t sing and be invis, and they are nice enough to put that text in red so you notice it. But for enduring breath, there is no
ygData.messageBody:
Well, in the case of invis, can't sing and be invis, and they are nice
enough to put that text in red so you notice it. But for enduring breath,
there is no warning short of a gurgling noise you make as you try to extract
oxygen from water. You're right about the others though, I do know when
invis and illusions are about to drop 90% of the time. (although a little
additional input that every other class gets wouldn't hurt)

Drae

-----Original Message-----
From: beatdropbattledrum@...
[mailto:beatdropbattledrum@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 15, 2000 11:53 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Re: Song Icon Bug


I don't even really notice this because 90% of the time, I am looking
at my messages scrolling by. This helps me to twist songs (along w/
counting beats in my head) and so I will always see the messages that
say when your spells are going to wear off. I know that Invis(undead
and regular), Illusions, Endure Breath, Levitate, etc. all give you a
couple of *warning* messages. i.e. "You feel you are about to look
like yourself."

~Beatdrop Battledrum

submissions.
